title: 115_hr4790
content: Volcker Rule Regulatory Harmonization Act This bill amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to grant exclusive rulemaking authority under the Volcker Rule to the Federal Reserve Board. The bill exempts from the Volcker Rule banks with total assets: (1) of $10 billion or less, and (2) comprised of 5 or less of trading assets and liabilities.
